title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 8.4 - Health officer to report to state commissioner of health
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 8.4 - Health officer to report to state commissioner of health

State Regulations

Within 48 hours after the entry of any decision of the board declaring the conditions not to be a nuisance affecting health, or if within five days of the filing of the report of the health officer with the local board of health, said board fails to take action provided by section
8.3, supra, the health officer shall forward a copy thereof to the State Commissioner of Health, together with the original or copies of his report and other papers filed by him with the local board, as required in section
8.2, supra. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
8.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
